La Jolla Blue.petPolicy:
Cats & Restricted breed of dogs 
 Pet rent: $60/pet/month with a upfront
 $500/pet deposit.
La Jolla Blue.parking: 1 parking spot included with rent. An additional spot for $50/month.
La Jolla Blue.utilityDetails:
This includes setting up gas and electric through SDG&E, cable/internet through your choice of Spectrum or AT&T, and Renter’s insurance with $100,000 minimum liability.
 Water/ Wastewater/ Trash/ Recycling/ Pest Control/Valet Trash Pickup is one bill set up by the leasing office and is paid with rent. Water and wastewater will vary based on usage.
La Jolla Blue.holdingPeriod: 14 days from your application date if it’s vacant or from the date it is move-in ready if it's still occupied.
La Jolla Blue.housingDeposit: $500 base deposit due with approved screening, and up to half a month’s rent for a deposit on a conditional approval
La Jolla Blue.verification: State issued I.D. card, passport, driver license, SSN
La Jolla Blue.proofOfIncome: Income criteria based on the gross income on 2.5 times the base rent.

Solazzo Apartment Homes.address: 8506 Villa La Jolla Dr, La Jolla, CA 92037
Solazzo Apartment Homes.parking: 2 parking spots included, $60 for each additional spot
Solazzo Apartment Homes.utilityDetails: Water, trash, sewer, gas & electric, not included in rent
Solazzo Apartment Homes.holdingPeriod: 72 hours to hold an apartment before losing the required $200 hold deposit
Solazzo Apartment Homes.housingDeposit: $600-$800, or an amount equal to two months' rent, depending on approval guide
Solazzo Apartment Homes.verification: State issued I.D. card, passport, driver license, military I.D. card
Solazzo Apartment Homes.proofOfIncome:
Students will need co-signers and guarantors. 
 Co-signers/Guarantors must make 4 times the rent amount to qualify

La Regencia.petPolicy: Pets accepted; two pet maximum, weight and breed restrictions apply
La Regencia.parking: Each apartment is designated one parking spot. Parking is assigned.
La Regencia.utilityDetails: Water, trash, sewer, gas & electric, not included in rent
La Regencia.housingDeposit: Based on income, credit and rental history, applicants may be required to pay an additional security deposit of up to 2x the market rental rate.
La Regencia.proofOfIncome:
Combined gross monthly household income must exceed 2.5x the monthly rental amount. 
 Adult student applicants require I-20, J1 or financial aid letter confirming the name of the school and the number of months the student will be receiving financial aid. If the student receives living expense stipends from a third party (e.g. a parent), you can use that amount to determine the student's income.

Costa Verde.address: 8720 Costa Verde Boulevard, San Diego, CA
Costa Verde.petPolicy: This community is a NO PET community.
Costa Verde.parking: Garage parking. One space per apartment.
Costa Verde.utilityDetails: Water, trash, sewer, gas & electric, not included in rent
Costa Verde.housingDeposit: Based on income, credit and rental history, applicants may be required to pay an additional security deposit of up to 2x the market rental rate.
Costa Verde.proofOfIncome:
Combined gross monthly household income must exceed 2.5x the monthly rental amount. 
 Adult student applicants require I-20, J1 or financial aid letter confirming the name of the school and the number of months the student will be receiving financial aid. If the student receives living expense stipends from a third party (e.g. a parent), you can use that amount to determine the student's income.
